entry.title: King and Lionheart
entry.summary:
Author: elfinnemrys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,531Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 5

Summary: If you were to ask Merlin to count how many times Arthur Pendragon had died in his arms, he would look at you as if you knew the secrets of the world. “Twenty four,” he would solemnly say. “I happen to be exceptionally skilled at letting him die.” You would nod your head, say: “I understand, it’s not your fault,” and he would look at you with so much confusion you can’t help but laugh. “Who are you?” he would say then, and you would stop laughing immediately. Because what would you say? That you were the reason this was happening to him? That you were the reason he was losing his mind? That you were the land itself? Because they were all true. And they had surrounded him. The title is from Of Monster's and Men's song 'King and Lionheart'

entry.title: When Is a Monster Not a Monster?
entry.summary:
Author: QueenRumi21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,018Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 41

Summary: Arthur learns the truth far too late—or perhaps exactly when he was meant to. When Merlin’s magic is revealed under moonlight and fear, Camelot stands on the edge of ruin. This is a story about monsters and kings, destiny and choice, and the kind of love that dares to stay. When is a monster not a monster?Oh, when you love it.

entry.title: [Podfic] What If You're Someone I Just Want Around
entry.summary:
Author: sillyunicorn6154

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Arthur has always known that Merlin is keeping secrets. He has known it when Merlin stood up to him in a marketplace, eyes full of defiance and not a shred of fear to be found. He has known it when Merlin swung a mace at him even though it was clear that he had never handled one before, refusing to cower before anyone, prince or not. He has known it when Uther had made Merlin his servant, and Merlin looked as if he would walk out of Camelot right then and there. From the first day they’ve met, Arthur never wanted anything more than for Merlin to consider him worthy of each and every part of him. Sometimes, you love despite, not because. Sometimes, finding out does not change anything.

entry.title: Bitchy
entry.summary:
Author: luvroykent

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,500Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 42

Summary: Arthur never thought he would see the day that his court physician prescribed daily orgasms as the solution to his problems. However, here he is. Arthur has carried a secret his entire life. No one but Gaius knows that his intense mood swings are a result of his unique anatomy (modern day PMS, but magnified). Despite many attempts, he can’t seem to control his emotions, threatening his ability to rule. Gaius’s suggestion is his last hope. As he continues his “treatment”, he quickly realizes his desires are growing for a certain manservant. Merlin takes it upon himself to serve his king beyond what the usual servant duties entail. Will they be able to maintain their indifference, or will their indulgence lead to something more?

entry.title: the botanist
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,025Chapters: 2/14Kudos: 25

Summary: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife. However, truths universally acknowledged mean little when the situation at hand is not universal—or at least not so universal or common to merit good, reliable advice. For as often as there is a single young man in possession of a fortune searching high and low for a wife, there is the misfortune of a Mama and Papa having an eligible bachelor of a son whose interest in the gentler things in life is so stunningly absent that they must resort to pointing at any passing object of general human features and asking (pleading) if such a person might strike a flame to his interest. To put it shortly, the Lady Ygraine is desperate. (Pride & Prejudice AU - Lady Ygraine asks her dear friend Lady Nimueh to help her children get off their asses and strike out into the marriage market. With her help, Arthur soon finds himself introduced to a mysterious man who calls himself a botanist.)

entry.title: The Paper King
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,222Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 70

Summary: Sequel to The Trial of King Uther Pendragon As Camelot stands on the brink of a new reign, the future has never been more uncertain. After the death of Uther, Arthur is poised to take the throne. However, heavy is the head that wears the crown. With the Council’s ultimatum looming large, his own advisors quietly manoeuvre for power in the shadows. Merlin can no longer hide behind the anonymity of a servant. With his magic exposed, he is thrust into the heart of court politics and responsibility. Protecting Arthur is no longer his only duty, and his people need him more than ever. In a realm on the edge of change, can they find balance in their new roles, or will the weight of the crown and the cost of magic tear Camelot apart?

entry.title: greet me like the druids do (with a kiss)
entry.summary:
Author: thisbeautifuldelirium

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,981Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: “Um,” Merlin says, avoiding his eyes. “That’s a…druid greeting. I’ve been among them for so long, I…didn’t think about how it would seem to you.”Arthur blinks. Of course. That makes more sense than whatever scenario was starting to form in Arthur’s mind, of pushing Merlin against the wall, of sticking his tongue—Anyway, this just makes more sense, is all.---Arthur, desperate to show he can embrace traditions other than his own, and for no other reason, especially not having to do with how nice Merlin’s lips feel, starts greeting Merlin the druidic way.

entry.title: in these times of wanting prophecy
entry.summary:
Author: theonebraincell

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,504Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Recently crowned King Arthur has brought magic back to Camelot and made sweeping changes to the structure of his court. Peace, however, remains elusive, with the five kingdoms fractured and Morgause still striking from the shadows. One night, Morgana comes to him with a message from her dreams: there’s something they need to find to the north, beyond Ealdor; something that will help truly restore balance and usher in the Golden Age of Albion.   — a canon-divergent tale about the rise of albion, with one key addition: here be dragons.

entry.title: If I told you myself
entry.summary:
Author: riverray

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,903Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 872

Summary: Merlin can’t remember the last time he’s locked his bedroom door, if ever. But he chooses not to think about it. He merely sulks his way back to his bed, taking a moment to contemplate taking off his trousers and tunic from the night before. He decides not to think about that either. Instead, he decides not to think at all. He just falls back into his bed, covers up his body more so in shame than for warmth, and closes his eyes.   Basically Merlin is sexually assaulted and this story follows how he and everyone else deals with it. Spoiler alert: THEY DON'T HANDLE IT WELL.
